item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

25. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (271 points | 117 comments)
26. Swiftly 1.0 (10 points | discuss)
27. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (345 points | 99 comments)
28. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (940 points | 328 comments)
29. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (584 points | 437 comments)
